attributes.action: Take immediate action to halt street killings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the Prime Minister and his government to take immediate action to halt the almost daily street killings that are now taking place in this country. I do not believe that these can possibly be considered as "isolated incidents" and action needs to be taken to halt this anarchy in our society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
